# azure-sdk-dotnet

Azure SDK patterns and best practices for .NET developers. Covers 29 skills spanning AI, resource management, identity, messaging, and Key Vault libraries.

## Install

```bash
npx skills add microsoft/skills --skill azure-sdk-dotnet
```

```
/plugin install azure-sdk-dotnet@skills
```

## Skills

| Skill | Package / Focus |
|-------|----------------|
| `azure-ai-agents-persistent-dotnet` | Persistent AI Agents |
| `azure-ai-document-intelligence-dotnet` | Document Intelligence |
| `azure-ai-openai-dotnet` | Azure OpenAI |
| `azure-ai-projects-dotnet` | AI Foundry Projects |
| `azure-ai-voicelive-dotnet` | Voice Live |
| `azure-eventgrid-dotnet` | Event Grid |
| `azure-eventhub-dotnet` | Event Hubs |
| `azure-identity-dotnet` | Identity / Authentication |
| `azure-maps-search-dotnet` | Maps Search |
| `azure-mgmt-apicenter-dotnet` | API Center Management |
| `azure-mgmt-apimanagement-dotnet` | API Management |
| `azure-mgmt-applicationinsights-dotnet` | Application Insights Management |
| `azure-mgmt-arizeaiobservabilityeval-dotnet` | Arize AI Observability |
| `azure-mgmt-botservice-dotnet` | Bot Service Management |
| `azure-mgmt-fabric-dotnet` | Fabric Management |
| `azure-mgmt-mongodbatlas-dotnet` | MongoDB Atlas Management |
| `azure-mgmt-weightsandbiases-dotnet` | Weights & Biases Management |
| `azure-resource-manager-cosmosdb-dotnet` | Cosmos DB Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-durabletask-dotnet` | Durable Task Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-mysql-dotnet` | MySQL Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-playwright-dotnet` | Playwright Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-postgresql-dotnet` | PostgreSQL Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-redis-dotnet` | Redis Resource Manager |
| `azure-resource-manager-sql-dotnet` | SQL Resource Manager |
| `azure-search-documents-dotnet` | AI Search |
| `azure-security-keyvault-keys-dotnet` | Key Vault Keys |
| `azure-servicebus-dotnet` | Service Bus |
| `m365-agents-dotnet` | M365 Agents SDK |
| `microsoft-azure-webjobs-extensions-authentication-events-dotnet` | Auth Events Extension |
